analysis.description:
TokenERC20 (/unique_chucks/19/0x84d24cf1c4f20dacf82eefdf48acfa373d0ccd8a.sol#25-138) has incorrect ERC20 function interface(s):
	-transfer (/unique_chucks/19/0x84d24cf1c4f20dacf82eefdf48acfa373d0ccd8a.sol#85-91)

Contract locking ether found in /unique_chucks/19/0x84d24cf1c4f20dacf82eefdf48acfa373d0ccd8a.sol:
	Contract LUSD has payable functions:
	 - fallback (/unique_chucks/19/0x84d24cf1c4f20dacf82eefdf48acfa373d0ccd8a.sol#184-186)
	But does not have a function to withdraw the ether
